Sets the lighting of the containing sector to 0 and instantly lowers the floor to the lowest adjacent..."
revision.text:
{{codepointer|r=Strife}} '''A_LightGoesOut'''
(''no parameter'')
Sets the lighting of the containing sector to 0 and instantly lowers the floor to the lowest adjacent sector. Finally, it spawns 8 {{Class|Rubble1}} actors. The rubble will have a random x velocity in the range of -7-22, a y velocity of 0-7, and a z velocity of 7-10. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|PowerCrystal}} and derived classes.
